text: Shaunkji asked, " When that tale was compiled in scriptural form, that was later on related by Shukdevji. Where was it created? For what purpose and by whose inspiration, that scripture was compiled and how did Shukdevji, who was congenital wandered, came to study this scripture, and how he came to see the king Parikshit? What discussion took place between them?" What SUTJI narrated to the sages, forms the main body of the great scripture Shrimad Bhagwad.-
title: The Creation and Compilation of the Purana
